scripts.dev:app: cd AppMobile && set PORT=3000 && npm run start
scripts.dev:marcel: cd Quebec-IA-Labs-V8-Replit_Dev_20250812 && set PORT=3001 && npm run dev
scripts.dev:all: start npm run dev:marcel && start npm run dev:app
scripts.test:all: npm run test:marcel && npm run test:app
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:app && npm run lint:marcel
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:app && npm run install:shared
